parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle of revolution in radians

parameters.name: ReverseDir
parameters.description: True reverses the angle direction, false does not

parameters.name: Angle2
parameters.description: Angle of revolution in radians

parameters.name: RevType
parameters.description: Type of revolution as defined in swRevolveType_e (can be either mid-plane or two-direction)

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Additional control (see Remarks )

parameters.name: UseFeatScope
parameters.description: True if the feature only affects selected bodies, false if the feature affects all bodies

parameters.name: UseAutoSelect
parameters.description: True to automatically select all bodies and have the feature affect those bodies, false to select the bodies the feature affects (see Remarks )

parameters.name: AssemblyFeatureScope
parameters.description: True if the assembly feature only affects selected components in the assembly, false if the assembly feature affects all components in the assembly

parameters.name: AutoSelectComponents
parameters.description: True to auto-select all affected components, false to not (use the selected components)

parameters.name: PropagateFeatureToParts
parameters.description: True to propagate the assembly feature to the components, false to not

title: IFeatureManager.FeatureRevolveCut2
signature:
Feature FeatureRevolveCut2( 
   System.Double
Angle
,
   System.Boolean
ReverseDir
,
   System.Double
Angle2
,
   System.Int32
RevType
,
   System.Int32
Options
,
   System.Boolean
UseFeatScope
,
   System.Boolean
UseAutoSelect
,
   System.Boolean
AssemblyFeatureScope
,
   System.Boolean
AutoSelectComponents
,
   System.Boolean
PropagateFeatureToParts
)

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle of revolution in radians

parameters.name: ReverseDir
parameters.description: True reverses the angle direction, false does not

parameters.name: Angle2
parameters.description: Angle of revolution in radians

parameters.name: RevType
parameters.description: Type of revolution as defined in swRevolveType_e (can be either mid-plane or two-direction)

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Additional control (see Remarks )

parameters.name: UseFeatScope
parameters.description: True if the feature only affects selected bodies, false if the feature affects all bodies

parameters.name: UseAutoSelect
parameters.description: True to automatically select all bodies and have the feature affect those bodies, false to select the bodies the feature affects (see Remarks )

parameters.name: AssemblyFeatureScope
parameters.description: True if the assembly feature only affects selected components in the assembly, false if the assembly feature affects all components in the assembly

parameters.name: AutoSelectComponents
parameters.description: True to auto-select all affected components, false to not (use the selected components)

parameters.name: PropagateFeatureToParts
parameters.description: True to propagate the assembly feature to the components, false to not

remarks:
The Options argument allows additional control of the feature creation.Supported value is swRevolveOptions_e.
swAutoCloseSketch, which
closes the sketch if it is open.
When UseAutoSelect is false, the user must select the bodies that the feature will affect.
When using cut or cavity features that result in multiple bodies, you cannot select to keep all of the resulting bodies or one or more selected bodies.
For extruded feature cuts, see
IFeatureManager::FeatureCut
.
